title: About Anup Davin Mathivanan
text: Anup Davin Mathivanan is a Senior Full-Stack Java Developer with 8+ years of experience specializing in Enterprise Architecture, Cloud Solutions, and DevOps. He is based in Singapore/India and is available for new opportunities. His expertise includes Spring Boot, Microservices, React, AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes. He has deployed 50+ projects and written over 1 million lines of code.

He specializes in enterprise applications, RESTful APIs, microservices architecture, OAuth2, JWT authentication systems, ORM mapping, and database optimization. text: Anup has frontend skills in React (85%), TypeScript (80%), Angular (75%), JavaScript (88%), and Tailwind CSS (82%). He specializes in component architecture, state management, type safety for enterprise applications, RxJS, ES6+ async programming, responsive design, and utility-first CSS.

title: E-Commerce Microservices Platform
text: Anup built a scalable microservices architecture handling 100K+ daily transactions. The project involved decomposing a legacy monolith into 12 microservices with event-driven architecture. Key technologies: Spring Boot, Docker, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, Redis, AWS. Results: 99.9% uptime, 60% faster response times, 40% cost reduction. The platform processes 10K RPS with sub-200ms response times.

title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
text: Anup developed a high-performance analytics system processing 1M+ events per minute. Built with Spring WebFlux, Apache Kafka, InfluxDB, React, and D3.js. The event-driven architecture with reactive streams achieved sub-second analytics and 95% reduction in data latency. The system handles 50B+ data points for 10K+ users.
